response.overview: The true story of Holocaust Survivor Eva Libitzky who spent her post-war life in America visiting primary and secondary schools throughout the United States to tell her story. At one particular school, a diverse group of students who study music but are unaware of the events of WWII gather at an assembly to “honor” their guest with music. As Eva’s story reveals itself, there is a shocking turn of events, where everyone present finds themselves reliving a very terrifying past.
response.title: The Assembly
